answers.answer: Have you ever been checked for glucose intolerance or diabetes?If not, I may be a good idea to get that done.  Neuropathy can be experienced anywhere.  It is very common to los sensitivity due to glucose intolerance or diabetes.The loss of sensations may also be caused by any supplements that you are taking.  Too much of some of the Vitamin B complex can cause nerve damage, as can having too much vitamin D.In another post you asked about Vitamin B12.  Your doctor can do a blood test to see if you are low on this vitamin and will prescribe tablets, or an injection every 3 months if you are very low.  Some people are not able to absorb this vitamin, which is through the gut.  The type that would be better to take would be the sublingual ones that you place under the tongue and are absorbed that way into your system.Book an appointment to see your doctor

question: Hello  everyoneI have penile numbness and coldness. Either it is due to Pudenal nerve Entrapment or I have penile periphrial nueropathy. However the penis is numb all around. If I pinch I can feel pain. I can get an erection and achieve climax however the orgasm is not as strong. I still feel numb during erection and the pleasure is not what it used to be. My Testicals also have the numbness. Also the Numbness for my penis and testicals is not complete numbness ,but it is a drastic decrease in sensitivity.This all started during December of 2014 when my sensitivity started to fall to a lower level of Sensitivity.Any responses or messages are welcomed. Please anyone who experienced this before reply you will be helping my world by such a large amount. I pray for help and any cures for this.
title: Penlle Numbness and cold feeling
